member.name: M:SignalProcessing.FFT.RealFFT(System.Double[],System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Performs an FFT on a real value input signal.
member.param: The input signal. Should ideally be contiguous in time
The number of points in a single FFT. Must be a 2^n value, for n = 1 to 14
The number of FFT averages to perform

member.name: T:SignalProcessing.Command
member.summary: Command enum for the FFT calculation thread

member.name: T:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer
member.summary: FFT data streaming class. Handles the FFT calculation and reading data from the DUT

member.name: T:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.FFTDoneHandler
member.summary: Signature for the FFT done event handler

member.name: E:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.FFTDone
member.summary: This event is raised when an FFT has completed

member.name: P:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.FrequencyRange
member.summary: The frequency values (Hz) for each bin. Read only

member.name: P:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.NumAverages
member.summary: The number of FFT averages to perform before raising an FFT done event.

member.name: P:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.RegList
member.summary: The list of registers to stream data from

member.name: P:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.Result
member.summary: The FFT result. This is a M x N array, where M is the number of registers and N is the FFT length.

member.name: P:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.Length
member.summary: The FFT length. Must be a 2^n value, for n = [1,14]

member.name: P:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.SampleFrequency
member.summary: The sample frequency. Should be set to Fs, or the DUT data ready frequency.

member.name: M:SignalProcessing.FFT_Streamer.NewBuffer(System.Int32)
member.summary: New buffer handler. Converts data to double and enqueues it for the FFT thread to process
member.param: Number of elements in the buffer
